page.title: 08The Animal And Bird Garden
page.content: The Animal and Bird Garden was opened in May 1983.They chose this area because many people come to walk on the Malvern hills and the Gardens offered another interest for them.The Gardens are open every day of the year except Christmas day.There are 100 different species of animals and birds .The most expensive a black spider monkey costing Â£1,600.Strict safety precautions are taken,the animals are brought from zoos in different parts of the world,not wild from the jungle. All dangerous animals are caged but to keep interest,visitors are encouraged to handle snakes and get as close as possible to most creatures. They had difficulty getting permission for the Gardens many people didn't want it because they were afraid of animals escaping,but today they've won support of the locals.
